article:
My beloved mother has always inspired me and changed my views and attitude towards life. She is sure that I would one day become   _  ,
and that I would be one of the great ones.She has taught me that I can do anything if I put my  _  to it.
As a young boy, I struggled to achieve tasks that came  _  to most.I had problems writing, reading and especially speaking.I did not talk the way   _  kids did and did not respond to
questions or stay alert to my surroundings.My reading was poor  _  with teachers helping
me, and my speech was hard to  _  .My writing was not at the  _  it should have been.Even simple things like knowing my left from my right or being able to snap my fingers were   _   .My mother  _  all

indeed conquer all the problems that had troubled me.She spent hours every day  _  me everything I needed to know, determined to help me learn.  _  her I would not be anywhere close to the level I am now.
In addition, she gave  _  for my life.She told me what to do and what not to do.Her expectations have always been high  _  she
knows that I can do it.For that, I thank her.She would not allow her son to be incapable.She never  gave up  on me, and to this day she tells

She used her gifts as a   _  to help a child - her child - and now 1 have the opportunity to
